text.tspan: 全球最好的18個離岸風場，

tspan.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Heavy, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace
text.tspan: 再生能源產業在美國所創造的就業機會是

tspan.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Heavy, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

svg.text: 2017後再生能源產業將持續成長，新的就業機會多半在亞洲
